tool.name: B-Spline Approximation
tool.description: Calculates B-spline functions for chosen level of detail. This tool serves as the basis for the 'Multilevel B-spline Interpolation' and is not suited as is for spatial data interpolation from scattered data.

param.name: TARGET_USER_COLS
param.label: Columns
param.help: Number of cells in East-West direction.

param.name: TARGET_USER_ROWS
param.label: Rows
param.help: Number of cells in North-South direction.

param.name: TARGET_TEMPLATE
param.label: Target System
param.help: use this grid's system for output grids

param.name: LEVEL
param.label: Range
param.help: B-spline range expressed as number of cells.
